urge you to check the name of the director and come back again 	 is the story of the sad demise of diane selwyn wannabe-actor who is hopelessly in love with another actor camilla rowles 	 due to diane lack of talent she is constantly struggling to advance her career and feels she failed to deliver on her own and her parents expectations 	 upon realizing that camilla will never be hers becomes engaged with adam kesher the director she hires hitman to get rid of her and subsequently has to deal with the guilt that it movie first starts off with what may seem as strange opening for this kind of thriller which is some contest in which we can see the main character betty giving great performance 	 we also see an elderly couple which we will see twice more throughout the movie together with her and applauding wait 	 this is what most people see the first time they view it 	 there actually another very significant fact that is given before the credits the camera moving into an object although blurry and the scene quickly fading out 	 if you look closely the object is actually pillow revealing that what follows is main characters seen in the first half of the diane selwyn imaginary self used in the first half of the movie that constitutes the dream-sequence positive portrayal of successful aspiring young actor the complete opposite of diane 	 betty was chosen as the name as that is the real name of the waitress at winkies 	 notice that in the dream version the waitresses name is the fantasy version of camilla rhodes that through diane dream and with the help of an imaginary car-accident is turned into an amnesiac 	 this makes her vulnerable and dependent on diane love 	 she is then conveniently placed in aunt luxurious home which betty has been allowed to stay in real life adam mother 	 in the dream part the woman in charge of the apartment complex that betty stays in 	 she mainly strong authority figure as can be witnessed in both parts of the the director 	 we know from the second half that he gets engaged with camilla 	 his sole purpose for being in the first half of the movie is only to serve as punching bag for since she develops such hatred towards ruth diane real aunt but instead of being out of town she is actually dead 	 diane inherited the money left by her aunt and used that to pay for camilla 	 roach typical lynchian character 	 not real appears only in diane dream sequence 	 he mysterious influential person that controls the chain of events in the dream from his wheelchair 	 he serves much of the same function as the backwards-talking dwarf which he also plays in twin hitman the person that murders camilla 	 this character is basically the same in both parts of the movie although rendered in slightly more goofy fashion in the dream sequence more on that having established the various versions of the characters in the movie we can begin to delve into the plot 	 of course will not go into every little detail neither will lay it out chronologically but will try to explain some of the important scenes in relation to lynch mentioned above camilla was re-produced as an amnesiac through her improbable survival of car-accident in the first minutes of the movie which left her completely vulnerable 	 what found very intriguing with md is that lynch constantly gives hints on what is real and what is 	 already mentioned the camera moving into the pillow but notice how there two cars riding in each lane approaching the one of the cars actually hit the limo what about the other 	 even if they stayed clear of the accident themselves would they try to help the others or at least call for help 	 my theory is that since this is dream the presence of the other car is just set aside and forgotten about 	 since as rogert ebert so eloquently puts it like real dreams it does not explain does not complete its sequences lingers over what it finds fascinating dismisses unpromising after rita crawls down from the crash site at mulholland and makes her way down the hillside and sneaks into aunt ruth apartment betty arrives and we see this creepy old couple driving away staring ghoulishly at each other and grinning at themselves and the camera 	 this is the first indication that what we seeing is the old couple seem to be unfamiliar to betty think they actually her parents since they were applauding her at the jitterbug contest 	 perhaps she did know them all that well and did really have as good relationship with them as she wanted so the couple is shown as very pleasant and helpful to her in the dream 	 they also represent her feelings of guilt from the murder and diane sense of unfulfillment regarding her unachieved goals in her rather long and hilarious scene is the one involving the hitman 	 diane apparently sees him as the major force behind the campaign trying to pressure the director to accept camilla part in the movie from adam party in the second half of the movie and he therefore at totally screwing his audience over since they given false pretence in which to view the love that something just bit me bad line though 	 next interesting scene is the one with the two persons at twinkies who are having conversation about how one of them keep having this recurring nightmare involving man which is seen by him through wall outside of the diner that they sitting in 	 after little talk they head outside and keep walking toward the corner of fence accompanied of course by excellent music matching the mood of the reaching the corner bum-like character with disfigured face appears out from behind the corner scaring the living crap out of the man having the nightmare 	 this nightmare exists only in diane mind she saw that guy in the diner when paying for the murder 	 so in short her obessions translate into that poor guy nightmares 	 the bum also signifies diane evil side as can be witnessed later in the cowboy constitutes along with the dwarf one of the strange characters that are always present in the lynchian landscape diane only saw him for short while at adam party but just like our own dreams can award insignificant persons that we hardly know major part in our dreams so can he be awarded an important part in her dream 	 we are also given further clues during his scenes that what we seeing is not real his sudden disappearance cowboy is also used as tool to mock the director when he meets up with him at the odd location the lights here give clear indication that this is part of dream 	 also notice how he says that he will appear one more time if he adam does good or two more times if he does bad 	 throughout the movie he appears two more times indicating to diane that she did bad 	 he is also the one to wake her up to reality that scene is probably an illusion made to fit into her requirements of him appearing twice and shortly thereafter she commits espresso-scene with the castigliane brothers where we can see badalamenti the composer as luigi is probably result of the fact that diane was having an espresso just before camilla and adam made their announcement at adam party in the second half 	 it could at the same time also be statement from the scene in which they enter diane apartment the body lying in the bed is camilla but notice how she assumed diane sleeping position diane is seeing herself in her own dream but the face is not hers although it had the same wounds on the face as diane would have after shooting herself 	 this scene is also filled with some genuine lynchian creepiness 	 since diane did not know where or when the hitman would get to camilla and finish her off she just put her into her own real life diane audition for the movie part was bad 	 in her dream she delivers perfect audition leaving the whole crew ecstatic about her interesting is the fact that the money that in real-life was used to pay for camilla murder now appears in purse 	 this is part of diane undoing of her terrible act by effectively being given the money back as the murder now has taken her neighbor arrives to get her piano-shaped ashtray another hint is given she takes the ashtray from her table and leaves yet later when camilla and betty have their encounter on the couch we see the ashtray appear again when the camera pans over the table suggesting that betty encounter with the neighbor was catch phrase of the movie adam is auditioning actresses for is she is the girl which are the exact same words that diane uses when giving the hitman camilla photo blue box and the key represent the major turning point in the movie and is where the true identities of the characters are revealed 	 there much symbolism going on here the box may represent diane future it empty or it may be sort of pandora box the hitman laughs when she asks him what the key will open 	 either way it is connected to the murder by means of the blue key which is placed next to her after the murder has taken place 	 the box is also seen at the end of the movie in the hands of the disfigured silencio is neat little addition to further remind the viewer that what is viewing is not real 	 it also signifies that diane is about to wake up to her reality her reality being nightmare that she is unable to escape from even in her the chilling scene at the end where the creepy old couple reappear diane is tormented in such way that she sees suicide as the only way out in order to escape the screams and to avoid being haunted by her that is my 	 hope this could help people from bashing out at this movie and calling it the worst movie ever
